posts.postText:
You have recentley entered a strange mine shaft. You are only 12 and were told to go in on a Dare. I shall start!

"I wish i had a light, its so dark." He heads deeper into the mine, trying to move without tripping on the debris.

>> Horror/Sci-Fi , not comedy -_-â€‰
You have obviously not played minecraft enough.
He spots a tall figure moving several large boulders in the distance.
He walks towards the creature, and greets it with a friendly "Hello!" But as the creature turns to face him...
The creature stares at him, waiting for him to look him in the eyes. It has purple entities floating around him like some kind of aura, it's then when i look at his dark square-shaped face.

It sprouts dark satanic like wings, it tries to whip its spiked tail at me but i rolled under. I ran back to the entrance of the cave, but there was no entrance. Only a pile of rocks and debris, it must of trapped me down here with those boulders it was moving.
